name: Judgement (itch) (JCstock)
description:
This game is an experience build made for my DES-350 course, Game art and Engines. Everything except the music and fire effect was done by me, the music is all royalty-free music I found online. 

Fair warning, this experience is intended to make you feel bad about yourself. If you're okay with that, please continue. The build isn't as polished as I'd like it to be because of a serious medical problem that impeded my work halfway through the semester. I was also working on this while my step dad was in a coma due to COVID, so it's a little janky in areas. Please don't try to escape the level, I haven't done anything to prevent players from doing so and I know it's very possible.
